statements: DELETE FROM in_app_purchases WHERE purchase_id = 100 AND player_id = 500;
DELETE FROM in_app_purchases WHERE item_purchased = 'Power-up' AND purchase_amount > 10.00;
DELETE FROM player_purchases WHERE player_id = 123 AND purchase_amount > 100.00;
DELETE FROM player_accounts WHERE total_purchases < 5 AND last_login < '2021-10-01';
DELETE FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 100 AND item_quantity < 5
DELETE FROM purchase WHERE player_id = 1 AND game_id = 3;
